name: Vagrant Strider
description:
Welcome to a Ruined and  Ancient World filled with mystery and mayhem.  Can you solve the mystery and prevent the rebirth of an Evil God?

GDN GAME JAM 2021 Rebirth Submission built on my engine that is currently being developed.  Nothing is finished.  Everything needs more work.  Please let me know if you have issues or thoughts with the game.  TUwU.
